activities.name: nb_GoContractor_Bronze_Accounts
activities.description:
This Notebook explicitly uses the source and target by passing these table names in as parameters (i.e. hard-coded for this table only):
SRC_TABLE  = "stg_gocontractor_accounts"
DST_TABLE  = "bronze_gocontractor_accounts"

Although the code is much more controlled (i.e we can create a Notebook for each and every table to extract), we can also use the other method which loops through a Watermark table - see the other Notebook in this Pipeline - not fully developed - but is used by Keepmoat for extracting HR data).
